title: FireTV /Android TV- Performance
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user with MLB App installed on their FireTV device
custom_steps: WHEN I am using the app
custom_expected: THEN the app does not crash, close or lock

title: Amazon/Google audio button
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user with the MLB app installed on their Amazon FireTV or Android TV device
custom_steps:
WHEN I am using the app
AND I press the microphone button on the remote
custom_expected: THEN no stability or graphical issues occur

title: App Icon
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user with the app installed on their Android TV or Fire TV (recommended to test this test case on an older device)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user accesses the app on their homescreen or app page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the appropriate MLB icon is displayed for the app

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user accesses the app from Settings---> Application----> Managed install application
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the appropriate MLB icon is displayed for the app
